name: Chaos (itch) (Whyatt1872)
description:
Submitted initially for Mini Game Jam 80

Chaos the cat has gotten loose and started causing chaos!

Help them knock things off and into other things, but watch out for the doggos!

Try to cause as much chaos as you want!

Note about Web version:

There is a very high chance that there will be audio issues. Unfortunately this is due to the game engine exporter. Luckily there is a nifty mute button. Otherwise, if you'd really like to be able to hear the music and sound without issue please download the game.

Controls:

Up arrow / W = jump

Down arrow / S = crouch (jump when crouching for super jump!)

Left/Right Arrows / A/D keys = move Chaos

Q key = end your reign of chaos

R key = reset level (useful if the game's physics go crazy or you get stuck)
